description: Season 2 of Baby Steps. Maruo Eiichirou has begun his training in America and quickly realizes that he has still a long way to go. Facing his comrades in the daily matches helps him to realize his own weaknesses and his time overseas proves to be extremely valuable for his development, both as a tennis player and as a person.

name.native: アレックス・オブライアン

node.description: Website Date of Birth: December 19, 1973 Birthplace: Takasaki City, Gunma Prefecture, Japan __Introduction:__ Suzuki Akihito, also known as Akkin, is a Japanese composer, arranger, guitarist and music producer. __Biography:__ He's a former guitarist for the band Heart Bazaar, which is also the band he made a major debut with in the year of 2000. He would later make his actual debut with the band jet, through the record label TOY'S FACTORY. (Source: Wikipedia)
Tomohiro Sunaoshi is a recording engineer.
__Yuusuke Inada__ is a Japanese sound effects editor.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/高橋ナツコ)

_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/193091/)._

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/dajinman)__ | __[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/tomoyuki.kurokawa.7)__

__Tomoyuki Kurokawa__ is a Japanese director, episode director and storyboard artist. He was affiliated with studio Bee Train.

He made his lead directorial debut with the OVA _[Murder Princess](https://anilist.co/anime/1696/Murder-Princess/)_, and had his first lead director role with the release of _[Psychic Detective Yakumo](https://anilist.co/anime/7662/Shinrei-Tantei-Yakumo/)_.
